item.description:
Hi  Trailblazers join us for an snowshoeing adventure as we go snowshoeingat Kingman farm.  We will have nearly a full moon to light our way.  After the event we will meet at "Libby  Bar and Grill " in down town Durham.

Please bring appropriate clothing as it might be very cold out.

In the unlikely event of no snow we will go hiking.  Only rain or a heavy snow storm will cancel this event.

Please bring a head light or other appropriate flashlight.

Other meetup groups will be attending.

If anyone gets lost please call me at: 603-312-6735

Hope to see everyone there!

Peter

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Full Moon Snowshoe Hike
